reviewText:
Penthouse Tropical Spice fifty-nine minutes long and was released in 1998. In my opinion this was not one of Penthouse better videos. What you basically get is sexy intercourse scenes. There were only three nude scenes. Only during Samantha Michaels and Julia Garvey solo and duet scene were there any nudity. There was some nudity in the Lorrisa & Brook scene. Not all ladies got equal time and the only female that did not get a solo scene was Shelly Jones. Below is the order that the ladies appeared. Penthouse Tropical Spice gets a C+ for the sexy ladies only.

Lorissa McComas
Brook Bradford
Lorisa & Brook
Heather St. James-Penthouse Pet December 1996
Heather, Lorisa, and Shelly
Andrea Kurtz-Penthouse Pet May 1997
Andrea & Brook
Samantha Michaels-Penthouse Pet November 1996
Julia Garvey-Penthouse Pet June 1996
